subtitle: A lovely accompaniment to a barbecued meal.

method.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan. Add allspice and rice and fry for 2-3 min stirring constantly to prevent burning.
Add the water to the pan to cover the rice. Bring to boil then simmer for 10-15 min or until tender and all of the water has been absorbed.
Stir in the kidney beans, heat through for 2-3 min. Serve immediately.

title: Allspice rice
